benchmark_details.name: MolExp
benchmark_details.overview: MolExp is a novel benchmark emphasizing the discovery of structurally diverse molecules with similar bioactivity, simulating real-world drug design challenges.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure the rediscovery of structurally diverse molecules with comparable bioactivity in drug design.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark relies on similarity functions that may not be used in real-world drug design.

data.annotation: Manual curation and filtering for drug-like properties.

methodology.calculation: Molecular similarity is calculated using a modified scoring function based on Levenshtein distance.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score indicates better performance in rediscovering target molecules.
methodology.baseline_results: Baseline performance varies based on algorithm; ACEGEN MolOpt configuration performs best on tasks.
methodology.validation: Benchmark performance validated with multiple runs and comparisons to existing benchmarks.
